entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the morning then rising.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
